statements: SELECT * FROM BoxerRecords;
SELECT boxer_name, age, weight FROM BoxerRecords;
SELECT record_win, record_loss FROM BoxerRecords WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM BoxerRecords ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT boxer_name, record_win, injury_history FROM BoxerRecords WHERE record_loss > 5;
SELECT * FROM BoxerRecords WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY record_win DESC, weight ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT boxer_id, boxer_name, age, weight FROM BoxerRecords WHERE record_win > 20 AND record_loss < 5
SELECT boxer_id, boxer_name, record_win, injury_history FROM BoxerRecords WHERE weight BETWEEN 55.00 AND 75.00
SELECT boxer_name, record_loss FROM BoxerRecords WHERE injury_history IS NOT NULL AND injury_history != '' ORDER BY boxer_name ASC
SELECT boxer_id, boxer_name, age, record_win FROM BoxerRecords WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY age DESC, record_win ASC
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords;
SELECT boxer_name, date_of_birth FROM MedicalRecords WHERE blood_type = 'AB';
SELECT boxer_name, blood_type FROM MedicalRecords ORDER BY boxer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM InjuryHistory WHERE injury_type = 'Fracture' AND date_of_injury >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT boxer_name, COUNT(injury_id) AS total_injuries FROM InjuryHistory GROUP BY boxer_name HAVING total_injuries >= 3;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE blood_type = 'O+';
SELECT boxer_name, date_of_birth FROM MedicalRecords ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC;
SELECT * FROM InjuryHistory WHERE date_of_injury BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT boxer_name, injury_type FROM InjuryHistory WHERE injury_type LIKE 'Head%' ORDER BY boxer_name DESC;
SELECT m.boxer_name, m.date_of_birth, i.injury_type FROM MedicalRecords m JOIN InjuryHistory i ON m.boxer_name = i.boxer_name ORDER BY i.date_of_injury ASC, m.date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records;
SELECT first_name, last_name, dob FROM boxers WHERE dob < '1990-01-01';
SELECT record_date, diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%fracture%';
SELECT boxer_id, COUNT(*) AS injury_count FROM injuries GROUP BY boxer_id;
SELECT * FROM boxers ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%heart%';
SELECT first_name, last_name, weight FROM boxers ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT record_id, record_date, diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE record_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY record_date ASC;
SELECT b.first_name, b.lastjson_name, i.injury_date, i.injury_type FROM boxers b INNER JOIN injuries i ON b.boxer_id = i.boxer_id WHERE b.weight > 70;
SELECT b.first_name, b.last_name, m.record_date, m.diagnosis FROM boxers b LEFT JOIN medical_records m ON b.boxer_id = m.boxer_id WHERE m.record_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY m.record_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Boxers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, weight_class FROM Boxers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM Boxers WHERE weight_class = 'Middleweight';
SELECT boxer_id, date_occurred, severity FROM Injuries WHERE severity = 'Severe' ORDER BY date_occurred;
SELECT champ_name, date_won, weight_class FROM Championships WHERE boxer_id = 123;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Boxers ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Injuries WHERE severity = 'Severe' AND date_occurred BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT boxer_id, first_name, last_name, weight_class, age FROM Boxers WHERE age > 30 AND weight_class = 'Heavyweight' ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT Boxers.first_name, Boxers.last_name, COUNT(MedicalRecords.record_id) AS medical_count FROM Boxers JOIN MedicalRecords ON Boxers.boxer_id = MedicalRecords.boxer_id GROUP BY Boxers.boxer_id HAVING medical_count > 5;
SELECT champ_name, date_won, first_name, last_name FROM Championships JOIN Boxers ON Championships.boxer_id = Boxers.boxer_id WHERE weight_class = 'Middleweight';
SELECT * FROM Boxers WHERE age > 25;
SELECT name, weight FROM Boxers WHERE height > 180 ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT record_id, date, diagnosis FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'Broken Nose' ORDER BY date;
SELECT boxer_id, date, type, severity FROM Injuries WHERE boxer_id = 3 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT match_id, match_date, winner_id FROM Matches WHERE winner_id IS NOT NULL AND match_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY match_date;
SELECT * FROM Boxers;
SELECT name, age, weight FROM Boxers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, height FROM Boxers ORDER BY height DESC;
SELECT b.name, m.date, m.winner_id FROM Boxers b JOIN Matches m ON b.boxer_id = m.winner_id;
SELECT g.name AS gym_name, g.location, g.trainer, b.name AS boxer_name FROM Gyms g JOIN Boxers b ON g.trainer = b.name;
